tab_text.message: Color of text in active tab and toolbar

button_background_active.message: Background color of the toolbar button when pressed

button_background_hover.message: Background color of the toolbar button when hovered

icons_attention.message: Color of toolbar icons in attention state (Example - Starred bookmark, finished download etc.,)

popup.message: Background color of popups (such as the url bar dropdown and the arrow panels).

popup_highlight.message: Background color of selected item highlighted using the keyboard in popups (Example - selected item in URL bar)

popup_highlight_text.message: Text color of items highlighted using keyboard inside popups

tab_loading.message: Color of the tab loading indicator and the tab loading burst.

toolbar_bottom_separator.message: Border color separating browser UI from the webpage

toolbar_field.message: Background color for fields in the toolbar, such as the URL bar

toolbar_field_border.message: Border color for fields in the toolbar

toolbar_field_border_focus.message: Focused border color for fields in the toolbar

toolbar_field_focus.message: Focused background color for fields in the toolbar

toolbar_field_text.message: Color of text in fields in the toolbar

toolbar_field_text_focus.message: Color of text in focused fields in the toolbar

toolbar_field_separator.message: Color of seperators in toolbar and URL bar

toolbar_text.message: Color of text in the toolbar

toolbar_top_separator.message: Border color between toolbar and inactive tabs

toolbar_vertical_separator.message: Color of the separator next to the application menu icon

fillMessage.message: Please select the appropriate colors for the various options provided. Items marked with * are compulsory
